data.name: Tales from Candlekeep - Birdsong's Entertainer Pack
data.detailed_description:
Dare to venture deeper into the deadly jungles of Chult with Birdsong's Entertainer Pack.
Get a legendary accessory, additional gold pieces, as well as crafting materials to help you in your perilous adventure.

But that’s not all! The pack also includes Birdsong's d20, an exclusive permanent 50% bonus to Gold earned*, and a wallpaper of Birdsong in super high resolution, 2560x1440 pixels, and lower!

This pack includes:


  • Birdsong Wallpaper
  • Birdsong d20
  • Legendary “Singing Wind” Lute (+50% Gold)
  • Additional Permanent Bonus: + 50% Gold*
  • 5,000 Gold
  • Reinforced Legendary Chest: 40x Diamond, 40x Dragon Hide, 40x Adamantine, 40x Weirwood

* Can be toggled on and off in game if desired.

When purchased and downloaded, the wallpaper artwork will appear at \Steam\steamapps\common\TalesfromCandlekeep\Wallpapers.

fullgame.name: Tales from Candlekeep: Tomb of Annihilation

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560, 1024 MB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: El Capitan (10.11) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
